header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.activity: talking about Liverpool over a cup of tea

so anyway so then we went off for the day so that was it we had breakfast get in the hotel went off for the day and it was well what shall we do? and I said well we'll walk to the Albert Albert Docks I says and we'll go and do the maritime Museum and the Slave Museum all in one
all in one and er I think we must have been in there around about four hours

you know and the and the gov and the government's way of doing it was

not that long ago in when you put it into a time frame

you know so that was interesting and then we went through the Maritime and stuff and there was really good displays and then there was this display and it was about we could be who we wanted to be when we were on the on the merchant ships etcetera and it was about and it it's it did say hello sailor
